Andara Services & Packages

Andara Services & Packages combine all of your favorites: crystal grid, intuitive card reading, and Reiki into one affordable package.

~Activate & Receive ~

If you’re looking for more energy, focus, and inner-balance, the Activate & Receive package will do just that and more.  

  • Receive energetic support through a custom crystal grid which will help you to receive, activate, and ground the energy of this session and incorporate it at a cellular level while bringing peace and joy deeply within at soul level.
  • Heal your bodies - emotional, mental, physical, and spiritual - with a balancing Reiki session. This will leave you feeling revitalized, focused, and balanced to maximize your work efficiency, personal enjoyment, and overall satisfaction and contentment.

This service includes an intuitively created crystal grid specifically for you.  This crystal grid is a light code/language activation and grounding for the specific energy you are in at the time of service.  Each grid is unique to the individual and the energy present. The grid will be created in the room where the Reiki session will be received.  A photo can be taken and kept of the crystal grid. For these sessions, allow for 90 minutes. (Remote sessions - allow 60 minutes to receive the Reiki session.)

Individual Activate & Receive Session  
3 pack of Activate & Receive Sessions  
5 pack of Activate & Receive Sessions  
Gift certificates are available for the above services.

~Higher Self Activation~
If you’re looking for a complete reset and guidance from your higher self on how to proceed with a task or issue, the Higher Self Activation package will do just that and more.

  • Receive energetic support through a custom crystal grid which will help you to receive, activate, and ground the energy of this session and incorporate it at a cellular level while bringing peace and joy deep within at soul level.
  • Gain clarity, direction, and peace of mind surrounding an issue or concern that is running your mind ragged and leaving you emotionally drained with a powerful intuitive card reading.
  • Heal your bodies - emotional, mental, physical, and spiritual - with a balancing Reiki session. This will leave you feeling revitalized, focused, and balanced to maximize your work efficiency, personal enjoyment, and overall satisfaction and contentment.

This service includes an intuitively created crystal grid specifically for you.  This crystal grid is a light code/language activation and grounding for the specific energy you are in at the time of service.  Each grid is unique to the individual and the energy present. The grid will be created in the room where the intuitive card reading and Reiki treatment will be received. An intuitive card reading of 3-5 oracle cards will be done (the number of cards and which oracle deck will be used will be intuitively determined by me), summarized, and discussed.  A photo can be taken and kept of the crystal grid and oracle cards. For these sessions, please allow for 2 hours. (Remote sessions, please allow 60 minutes to receive the Reiki session.)

Individual Higher Self Activation Session
3 pack of Higher Self Activation Sessions  
5 pack of Higher Self Activation Sessions  
Gift certificates are available for the above services.
